bibl.title: Letter from Caroline Latimer to Charlotte C. Sweitzer, November 20, 1905

div1.p: Latimer writes that Kelly would like to know the location of Lazear's grave.

div1.head: Letter from Caroline Latimer to Charlotte C. Sweitzer, November 20, 1905
div1.p:
I write you by the
desire of Dr. Howard A.
Kelly, in regard to his life
of Dr. Walter Reed which
is now nearly ready for
publication. Dr. Kelly has
devoted one chapter to the
other members of the Yellow
Fever Commission, Dr. Lazear,
of course, among them. He
has not been able to ob-
tain information as to the
place where Dr. Lazear's
remains are interred, except
that it is near Baltimore,
but Dr. Thayer has kindly
furnished him with your
address in order that he
might refer to you.

If you will kindly
send him the necessary
information, he will be much oblig-
ed.
